parameter.name: enableIcons
parameter.label: Enable Icons
parameter.description: Defines whether UI renders icons for the widgets or not.

parameter.name: inlineSvg
parameter.label: Inline SVG
parameter.description: If enabled, any SVG icon provided by the openHAB icon server will automatically be converted to an inline SVG in the WEB page, allowing control of its color with the sitemap widget property "iconcolor" in the case where the SVG icon sets "currentColor" as the fill color. Note that this will work with custom SVG icons but not with all the packaged icons from the classic iconset since they are defined with a hard-coded color palette. This feature is disabled by default.

parameter.name: enableIconify
parameter.label: Enable Iconify Icons
parameter.description: If enabled, the UI will render iconify icons directly by downloading them from the Internet and caching them in the WEB browser. If disabled, the UI will use the standard method by requesting the server icon proxy and assuming iconify icons are installed on the server. Default is disabled.

parameter.name: condensedLayout
parameter.label: Condensed Layout
parameter.description: When enabled, changes the layout so that more widgets can fit on the screen.

parameter.name: nbColumns
parameter.label: Number of Columns
parameter.description: The number of columns to consider to fill the grid in large screen width (desktop) and medium screen width (tablet).

options.option: 2 columns on desktop but only 1 on tablet
3 columns on desktop but only 1 on tablet
3 columns on desktop but only 2 on tablet

parameter.name: capitalizeValues
parameter.label: Capitalize Values
parameter.description: Displays all widget states in uppercase.

parameter.name: webAudio
parameter.label: Web Audio
parameter.description: Play audio sent to the web audio sink.

parameter.name: defaultSitemap
parameter.label: Default Sitemap
parameter.description: The sitemap to show if no parameter is passed.
